name: South Yorkshire Connect+ (1 day or 7 days)
description: SOUTH YORKSHIRE CONNECT+ Unlimited travel for 1 day, 7 consecutive days or 28 consecutive days on all trains throughout South Yorkshire as well as to Denby Dale, Moorthorpe and South Elmsall in West Yorkshire. It is also valid on Sheffield trams and the Tram-Train to Rotherham Central & Parkgate and local buses throughout South Yorkshire.

fares_and_restrictions.raw: prices & restrictions Fares correct 1st April 2025 One day adult: £11.40 child: no child fare railcards: no 7 days adult: £37.70 child: no child fare railcards: no 28 days adult: £141.50 child: no child fare railcards: no time restrictions Valid anytime train operating companies CrossCountry, East Midlands Railway, Northern, Supertram, TransPennine Express purchasing Online : ✔ Train conductor: ✔ * (1 day ticket) Station ticket office: ✔ Ticket Vending Machine: ✔ * valid ticket to travel is required unless boarded at a station without ticket-issuing facilities

stations: Dore & Totley Elsecar Goldthorpe Hatfield & Stainforth Kirk Sandall
